name: BOLA
description:
Game Name- Bola

This is a simulation game based on the theme “”chain reaction”. In the game the player has to make a chain of items in order to make a ball reach the basket. 

The main protagonist of the game is a ball which we have to roll down to a basket. In order to do so the player gets few items to create a chain flow. 

The game has 3 level; each has different difficulty where the starting point of the player increases every level.
